page.title: 03POPULATION MOBILITY:PARKGATE
page.content: { 79 families}who live in{Parkgate were asked how many houses they had lived in during the past 8-11 years and where they had{lived previously. --------------------- * HOUSES : FAMILIES * --------------------- * 1 : 16 20% * * { 2 : 31 39% }* * 3 : 20 25% * * 4 : 7 9% * * 5 : 2 3% * * 6 : 0 * * 7 : 1 1% * * 8 : 0 * * 9 : 2 3% * --------------------- 63 families had lived in more than 1 house.{25 families}had moved within the{Parkgate/Neston area . { 14 families}had moved from the area { between Chester}and{Liverpool.
